chuckeles.sstasker.model.tasks

Class RepairTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • chuckeles.sstasker.model.tasks.Task
      • chuckeles.sstasker.model.tasks.RepairTask

  • public class RepairTask
extends Task
    Repair task. This task tells an engineer to repair a broken part.
